detectors.description:
SafeMath.subtract(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OnePiece.sol#50-57) has assert violation
	Assert violations:
	- assert(bool)(y <= x) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OnePiece.sol#55)

OnePiece.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OnePiece.sol#140-146) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances[from] = balances[from].subtract(tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OnePiece.sol#141)
	- balances[to] = balances[to].add(tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OnePiece.sol#143)

	- [balances[to] = balances[to].add(tokens)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OnePiece.sol#L143)

detectors.description: Variable OnePiece._totalSupply (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OnePiece.sol#101) is not in mixedCase

detectors.description:
allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OnePiece.sol#8-11)
	- OnePiece.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OnePiece.sol#120-122)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- OnePiece.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OnePiece.sol#130-134)
	- ERC20Interface.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OnePiece.sol#13-15)

totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- OnePiece.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OnePiece.sol#116-118)
	- ERC20Interface.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OnePiece.sol#17-20)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OnePiece.sol#22-25)
	- OnePiece.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OnePiece.sol#136-138)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- OnePiece.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OnePiece.sol#149-165)
	- ERC20Interface.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OnePiece.sol#27-29)
